title: All my freinds play and im broke broke. free key anyone?...
selftext: now im not the one to beg, im just asking if anyone should have gotten a key in a bundle or something. please dm me if you decide to be a kind soul. i have 7 mates who all play without me... i try to get them to jump on other games but they are high on rust atm, since im a student.. im broke, this was my last hope. have a great day yall.
